00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_CHECKERBOARD_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_CHECKERBOARD_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034         class CheckerboardElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00035         {
00036                 public:
00037                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00038                         {
00039                                 const int ix = (int)(floor (Math::MakeInt32Range (x)));
00040                                 return (ix & 1)? Real(-1.0) : Real(1.0);
00041                         }
00042         };
00043 
00044         class CheckerboardElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00045         {
00046                 public:
00047                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00048                         {
00049                                 const int ix = (int)(floor (Math::MakeInt32Range (x)));
00050                                 const int iy = (int)(floor (Math::MakeInt32Range (y)));
00051                                 return (ix & 1 ^ iy & 1)? Real(-1.0) : Real(1.0);
00052                         }
00053         };
00054 
00055         class CheckerboardElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00056         {
00057                 public:
00058                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00059                         {
00060                                 const int ix = (int)(floor (Math::MakeInt32Range (x)));
00061                                 const int iy = (int)(floor (Math::MakeInt32Range (y)));
00062                                 const int iz = (int)(floor (Math::MakeInt32Range (z)));
00063                                 return (ix & 1 ^ iy & 1 ^ iz & 1)? Real(-1.0) : Real(1.0);
00064                         }
00065         };
00066 
00068         class CheckerboardModule : public Module
00069         {
00070                 public:
00072                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00073                         {
00074                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new CheckerboardElement1D);
00075                         }
00077                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00078                         {
00079                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new CheckerboardElement2D);
00080                         }
00082                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00083                         {
00084                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new CheckerboardElement3D);
00085                         }
00087                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_CHECKERBOARD; }
00088         };
00089 };
00090 
00091 #endif // NOISEPP_CHECKERBOARD_H
